trigger: New photo by you is rejected
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time a photo uploaded by you is rejected by Stockimo.

trigger: Any live news photo uploaded by you
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you upload a live news photo to Stockimo.

trigger: New photo by you is accepted
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time a photo uploaded by you is accepted by Stockimo.

trigger: Any new photo uploaded by you
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you upload a photo to Stockimo.
This Trigger fires every time a new payment is credited to you on Stockimo

trigger: New photo by you is sold
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time a photo uploaded by you is sold on Stockimo.
